title: points数据库
txt_content:
我安装好了mysql数据库，但是服务器点券不会同步
storage: YAML
mysql:
  host: 127.0.0.1
  port: 3306
  database: minecraft
  user: root
  password: 123456
  import:
    use: false
    source: YAML
  export:
    use: false
    source: SQLITE
  retry: 10
vote:
  enabled: false
  amount: 100
  online: false
restrictions:
  autocompleteOnline: false
  hasPlayedBefore: false
debug:
  database: false
  uuid: false
vault: false
version: 2.1.3
复制代码

replies.author: 梦~
replies.txt_content:
storage:  MySQL
mysql:
  host:  数据库地址
  port: 数据库端口
  database: 数据库名称
  user: 数据库用户名
  password: 数据库密码


使用时注意安装前置插件 SQLibrary

storage: YAML
mysql:
  host: 127.0.0.1
  port: 3306
  database: minecraft
  user: root
  password: 123456
  import:
    use: false
    source: YAML
  export:
    use: false
    source: SQLITE
  retry: 10
vote:
  enabled: false
  amount: 100
  online: false
restrictions:
  autocompleteOnline: false
  hasPlayedBefore: false
debug:
  database: false
  uuid: false
vault: false
version: 2.1.3复制代码
